subject: Re:   Your account XXXXXXXX23 stat
body:
Dear Mr. Mark Limathai,

I received your message regarding the dormant account and the part payment of Million USD credited into an ATM Visa Card. However, I am a bit confused about the details you provided.

Could you please provide more information about this? Specifically, I would like to know how this situation came about and what steps I need to take next.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jennifer
